attributes.action: We would like a street or plaque in the memory of mr Daniel Keenan BEM in recognition of his work and achievements in Gibshill
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned would like to petition that a street name or plaque be erected in Gibshill in honour of the memory of mr Daniel Keenan BEM in recognition of his work and life passion for helping the people of Gibshill

rejection.details: One for the Local Council to consider.
